title: Vehicle sales in the United States 2019
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Vehicles, and a y axis representing Vehicle retail sales in thousands.
The highest category is found at Motor_vehicles_(total) where Vehicle retail sales in thousands is 17494.6.
The lowest category is found at Heavy_trucks where Vehicle retail sales in thousands is 529.5.
gold: In 2019 , a little under 17.5 million heavy trucks , light trucks , and cars were sold to customers in the United States . Light trucks accounted for about 70 percent of U.S. motor vehicle sales that year .
